title: Welcome to Astro
index_instructions_1: To get started, open the directory src/routes in your project.
index_instructions_2: Code Challenge: Tweak the "Welcome to Astro" message above.
index_card_1: Learn how Astro works and explore the official API docs.
index_card_2: Supercharge your project with new frameworks and libraries.
index_card_3: Explore a galaxy of community-built starter themes.
index_card_4: Come say hi to our amazing Discord community. ❤️
